alert.note: Alert for Clay (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 18 at 3:24AM EST until February 18 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... South Fork Kentucky River at Oneida affecting Clay County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...South Fork Kentucky River at Oneida. * WHEN...From early this morning to this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:20 AM EST, the estimated stage was 27.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to recede to 20.0 feet around 1 PM EST this afternoon and recede further to 16.3 feet around 7 PM EST this evening. - Action stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by 2 PM EST.
